description.en: During the course students must attend different performing arts performances (drama theatre, dance theatre, contemporary performing arts, music theatre,  live digital theatre, amateur theatre), fill their personal observational diaries and take part in seminars.
description.et: Kursuse läbimiseks tuleb külastada erinevaid etenduskunsti lavastusi. (sõnateater, tantsulavastus, kaasaegne etenduskunst, muusikateater, voogteater, harrastusteater), täita vaatluspäevikut ja osaleda seminarides.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to broaden up the student's backround in performing arts attending performances as an audience.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on üliõpilase etenduskunstide-alase taustsüsteemi laiendamine vaadates etendusi reaalses etenduskeskkonnas.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon a successful completion of the course student:
-has an open observing view in the field of performing arts and its different mediums for artistic expression;
learning_outcomes.et: -omab avarat vaadet etenduskunstide väljast ning erinevatest kunstilistest väljendusvahenditest

learning_outcomes.en: -has experienced different ways, how to percieve the performance by attending the performances.
learning_outcomes.et: -on kogenud erinevaid etenduse toimimise viise osaledes publikuna etendustel.
